metadata.description: Spells that gather information about fire, heat, and light

spells.name: Sense the Flames
spells.description: Detects all fires within a moderate distance, revealing their size, intensity, and location even through walls or other barriers.

spells.name: Eyes that Pierce the Fire's Heart
spells.description: Allows the caster to see clearly through fire, smoke, and heat distortion, and to see in perfect darkness as if it were bright daylight.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (see through fire), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Vision

spells.name: Scales of the Magical Temperature
spells.description: Determines the exact temperature of any object or substance, revealing whether it has been recently heated or cooled by natural or magical means.

spells.name: Test of the Flames
spells.description: Determines what was burned in a fire, how long ago it burned, and whether the fire was natural or magical in origin.

spells.name: Sight of the Forge's Fire
spells.description: Reveals the quality and properties of metal being worked in a forge, showing whether it is properly heated and ready for shaping.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (analyze heated metal), +1 Eye, +1 Concentration, +1 Terram requisite

spells.name: Perception of the Conflicting Motives
spells.description: Detects the emotional 'heat' of a person, revealing anger, passion, fear, or other strong emotions as visible auras around them.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (detect emotional heat), +1 Eye, +1 Concentration, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Invisible Fire Revealed
spells.description: Allows the caster to see magical fires and heat sources that are normally invisible, including magical auras and supernatural flames.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (see invisible fire), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Vision

spells.name: Whispers from the Brazier
spells.description: Allows the caster to see visions in flames, revealing events happening elsewhere or glimpses of possible futures.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (fire scrying), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +1 Imaginem requisite

spells.name: Heat of the Searing Forge
spells.description: Grants complete immunity to heat and fire for the purposes of sensing and detection, allowing safe exploration of burning areas.

spells.name: Palm of Flame
spells.description: Allows the caster to sense the history of any burned or heated object by touching it, learning what fires it has been exposed to.
